commands.description: Display a list containing all possible actions without cropped names and helpful descriptions for each option.
Display a list containing all commands for navigating the BastionCMD interface. You are on it right now!
This command will close BastionCMD and return you to the default Windows command prompt or Powershell.
Redisplay the opening dialog of BastionCMD in case you missed anything or just don't want to scroll up.
Enables screen clearing, for the case that you feel like the interface is a bit cluttered.
